name: Minimal Resume Builder
description:
Hey Guys,

we recently had hands on work with Application Tracking system and figured out, ATS actually considers the more traditinal format of resumes and cv's. But as team who got addicted to better desings, the traditional .docx cv's weren't our-GO, so we have made one.


This Minimal layout is designed so that the application system tracking can scan through your complete profile without discarding your information;


Fonts used Gilroy, Montserrat.


PRO: Change the Active colour to your liking
